name: Claret Moon
summary:
〝如果你正在阅读此文，
　说明可能你是大楼里唯一的幸存者。
　你的工作是逃离大楼找到其他幸存者。
　还有件事：当心！大楼里充满陷阱和受害者！〞

"If you are reading this probably you are the only one survivor in the building. Your job is to escape the building and find other survivors.
One more thing: be very attentive! The building is full with traps and victims!"
info:
• 中文名: 紫红之月
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Puzzle
  • 游戏引擎: RPG Maker VX
  • 发行日期: 2015/04/19
  • 售价: Free
